price: 54. Sinaamey sin Rabbi sin nafsik ixxigah siinit yayseh, siinih xuwaawam faxek iimaanat sin çulsa, hinnay sin digaalam faxek koroosannut sin qida, Nabiyow! atu iimaanal ken dirkissaah, ken taamoomi dacrissaamah koo maruubinnino.
arabic: رَّبُّكُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِكُمۡۖ إِن يَشَأۡ يَرۡحَمۡكُمۡ أَوۡ إِن يَشَأۡ يُعَذِّبۡكُمۡۚ وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbukum aʿlamu bikum in yasha yarḥamkum aw in yasha yuʿadhib'kum wamā arsalnāka ʿalayhim wakīlan
translations: He will have mercy on you
